channel.title: Changing quest reward items?
channel.description:
Hey guys, I was wondering how to change the rewards you get once you finish a quest... cause I have added a couple of custom items and I wanted to make them quest rewards, any help at all would be greatly appreciated...
Thanks ~ Vice ~

item.title: Changing quest reward items?
item.dc:creator: @Vice117 Vice117
item.description:
@Vice117 wrote:

What do you mean?? You mean like look in client.java for the ID of the items, or is there a place in client.java that has quest items, etc?

I’m a little confused…

Read full topic

item.title: Changing quest reward items?
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

look for the quest items that are for quests try that way ;)?

Read full topic
